summary: An email chain between FBI personnel forwarding a PDF attachment from an external source claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell's assets and operations in the UK and US. The chain discusses the source's claims about a network of sites and a UK company, Faraday Education Limited, with alleged connections to the case.

persons.name: Kenneth M. Oconnor
persons.context: Forwards an external email with a PDF attachment about Epstein/Maxwell to New York FBI colleagues for review by the case agents.

persons.name: Frank
persons.context: Was interviewed by a British media firm about fraud investigations and was subsequently contacted by the external source (Ugboma) who sent the information about Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: Ugboma
persons.context: External sender who contacted Frank after seeing his interview, claiming to have information about Epstein and Maxwell's assets and operational base in the UK, and referencing specific sites and a UK company.

persons.name: Damien McDonnell
persons.context: Named as a director of Faraday Education Limited, a UK company the source claims was set up for liaison with the Nigerian Ministry of Petroleum and has connections to British Ministry of Defence directorships, presented as part of the Epstein/Maxwell network.

persons.name: Rilwanu Lukman
persons.context: Mentioned as the Minister of Petroleum in Nigeria at the time Faraday Education Limited was allegedly set up to liaise with the Nigerian Ministry's P.T.D.F. scheme.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the case; the external source claims he and Ghislaine Maxwell conspired to leave a trail of their exploits and associations in the public domain.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Central figure in the case; the external source claims she and Jeffrey Epstein conspired to leave a trail of their exploits and associations in the public domain, and that assets and an operational base are in the UK.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Addressed in the email chain, likely an FBI agent in New York, receiving the forwarded information about Epstein/Maxwell.

connections.description: Described as having conspired to leave a trail of their exploits and associations in the public domain, with shared assets and an operational base.
Ugboma contacted Frank after seeing his media interview about fraud investigations, using him as a conduit to send information to the FBI.
Frank asked Oconnor to forward the information from Ugboma to the Epstein/Maxwell case agents.
McDonnell is listed as a director of Faraday Education Limited, which the source links to the Epstein/Maxwell network.
Ugboma claims to have information about Epstein's assets and operations, specifically referencing UK sites and companies.
Ugboma claims to have information about Maxwell's assets and operations, specifically referencing UK sites and companies.

events.title: External email sent to FBI
events.description: Ugboma sends an email with a PDF attachment to Kenneth Oconnor, claiming to have information about Epstein and Maxwell's assets and operations in the UK.

events.title: Forwarding of information within FBI
events.description: Kenneth Oconnor forwards Ugboma's email and PDF to New York FBI colleagues for review by the Epstein/Maxwell case agents.

events.title: Establishment of Faraday Education Limited
events.description: The external source claims Faraday Education Limited was set up in 2009 to act as liaison for the UK administration to the Nigerian Ministry of Petroleum's P.T.D.F. scheme.

events.title: Frank's media interview
events.description: Frank was interviewed by a British media firm about fraud investigations, which led to Ugboma contacting him.

keyFacts: An external source named Ugboma contacted the FBI via an intermediary (Frank) claiming to have information about Epstein and Maxwell's assets and an operational base in the UK.
The source references over forty UK sites and specific US sites near Teterboro Airport as requiring investigation in connection with Epstein and Maxwell.

The source points to a UK company, Faraday Education Limited, registered for 'Pre-primary Education' but allegedly set up in 2009 for liaison with the Nigerian Ministry of Petroleum, with director Damien McDonnell (former Head of D.E.R.A and D.A.A.).
The source asserts that either Epstein or Maxwell, or both, conspired to leave a trail of their exploits and associations in the public domain.
The email chain shows FBI personnel internally forwarding this unsolicited information for review by the Epstein/Maxwell case agents, after virus-checking the attached PDF.
